snippet: A family from Queens gets some help from the Neediest Cases as it starts the gradual process of rebuilding a life. Readers can help, too.
abstract: Editorial relates story of Joseph Duodu and his family, who were able to rebuild their lives following Hurricane Sandy after receiving assistance from Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: A family from Queens gets some help from the Neediest Cases as it starts the gradual process of rebuilding a life. Readers can help, too.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
